title: Miv and the Goddess of wishes
description: Goddess are a handfulJust like any other job Miv entered the castle. What he didnâ€™t know is that the orb of wishes was ready for a request. Upon entering the orb he is faced with the very goddess who would test him to the end of his wits. But this only starts him down another path he is to be trapped in for the rest of his life.With the arrival of the goddess and a new enemy Miv must now navigate his way through the court and gain the trust of two wizards, whom he was always taught to hate. He is placed on a journey with his new party to investigate the sudden appearance of a new lord in a faraway land. The only problem is it could cost him his own life and very soul.Join in this new adventure by the creator of the Creators of Six series Jacob L. White.
author: Jacob L. White
